snippet: After five years as athletic director, Haden is still trying to return U.S.C. to football greatness, but he has had other victories, including securing a long-term lease of L.A. Coliseum.
abstract: Profile of University of Southern California athletic director Pat Haden, who is still trying to lead university to football greatness;  Haden’s signature achievement since he was named athletic director is 98-year lease of Los Angeles Memorial Coliseum, secured in 2013.
lead_paragraph: After five years as athletic director, Haden is still trying to return U.S.C. to football greatness, but he has had other victories, including securing a long-term lease of L.A. Coliseum.

headline.main: Pat Haden’s Joyous Nights at U.S.C. Outweigh the Sleepless Ones
headline.print_headline: Haden’s Joyous Nights Outweigh Sleepless Ones
